gift_source:
::MC1::
What is the main purpose of the CIE XYZ model?
{
= To provide a standard reference for color representation
~ To describe only RGB displays
~ To define physical wavelength ranges
~ To replace illuminants
}
title: MC1
question: What is the main purpose of the CIE XYZ model?

choices.text: To provide a standard reference for color representation

gift_source:
::MC2::
How are XYZ values related to RGB?
{
= Linear combinations
~ Nonlinear gamma correction
~ Multiplicative blending
~ Subtractive primaries
}
title: MC2
question: How are XYZ values related to RGB?

gift_source:
::MC3::
What does the chromaticity diagram represent?
{
= All perceivable colors mapped by chromaticity
~ Only grayscale values
~ Image compression ratios
~ Light intensities only
}
title: MC3
question: What does the chromaticity diagram represent?

choices.text: All perceivable colors mapped by chromaticity

gift_source:

~ All colors humans can perceive
~ All wavelengths in visible light
~ A unit of luminance
}
title: MC4
question: What is a color gamut?

choices.text: Subset of colors a device can produce

= RGB -> Device dependent

question: Match the model to its property.
